(134, 190, augmented)

Label: GRMEligibilityOtherCriteriaText
Definition: A description of the considerations or factors that determine an applicant or application for an award eligible for the specified funding opportunity (e.g., criteria that have the effect of making an application or project ineligible for Federal awards, whether referred to as “responsiveness” criteria, “go-no go” criteria, “threshold” criteria, "disqualification factors", or in other ways). This section should also address any eligibility criteria for beneficiaries or for grant program participants other than Federal award recipients. (134, augmented)

Label: GRMGeneralEligibleApplicantBusinessTypeCharacteristicsTypeCode

Label: GRMPerformanceTypeCode

Label: GRMGoalID

Label: GRMPerformanceMeasureDescriptionText

For example, it can include counts, percentages, or levels. It could also describe an accomplishment, a product, a condition, a result, or a status. (202, augmented)

Output;
 Outcome
